name: V0.4.60 Release 2022-10-29
body:
- Python 2 support has been removed.
- several work on translation infrastructure

name: V0.4.59 Release 2022-09-10
body: small improvements on user interface

name: V0.4.58 Release 2022-09-04-2
body: several work on translations

name: V0.4.57 Release 2022-09-04
body: Several work on translations

name: V0.4.56 Release 2022-04-10
body:
Add a accessibility function for single handed use of mouse when selecting constraint features.
If the new button 'OneButton' is activated, pressing the ctrl-key is no longer needed for selecting the second feature of a constraint.

name: Release V0.4.55 2022-03-20
body: Integration of constraint diagnostic-tools of dan miel

name: V0.4.50 Release 2021-02-06
body:
- fix missing import of mirrored parts 
- improve import of parts which are using links (e.g. Draft-arrays) 

Now it is possible to import draft arrays (with usage of links) without loosing the colors.

name: V0.4.49 Release 2021-01-24
body:
- converting parts is now more flexible. The originals stay existent and can be edited. Updating the assembly updates the converted parts
- bugs fixed in axial- and circularEdge constraints.

name: V0.4.48 Release 2021-01-17
body:
- Fix a bug within axialCoincident constraint
- several minor fixes

name: V0.4.47 Release 2020-04-26
body: A new command has been added for finding conflicting constraints.

name: V0.4.46 Release-2020-04-04
body:
New automatic adjustment of constraints's directions after updating of imported parts. This improves the robustness of assemblies against flipping plane normals or flipping edge directions during assembly updates.

This is done automatically after part's update. Also a new command button is available to do this manually.
(a2p_reAdjustConstraintDirectionsCommand)

All constraints of an assembly document are readjusted at one step.

name: V0.4.45 Release 2020-03-07
body: * setting a constraint to invisible state now triggers constraint.Suppressed = True (an vice versa)

name: V0.4.44 Release 2020-02-23
body: Now it is possible to update only parts of  an assembly. If some parts/subassemblies are selected BEFORE using one of the update commands, you will be asked whether you want to update only the selected parts or the full assembly.

name: V0.4.43 Bugfix release 2020-02-23
body: * Fix missing parts during imports, caused by usage of shapebinders.

name: V0.4.42 Release 2020-02-01
body:
* avoid imported sketches to be listed in the partslist
* enhance constraints (pointOnLine, axial, axisParallel). An axis of a circular edge can be used as line.

The improved constraints give better flexibility if constraining parts to a sketch.

name: V0.4.41 Release 2020-01-26
body:
* allow "a2p_importSingleShapeReference" to import a single sketch from a FC file

The resulting shape from a sketch can be imported and can be used as:
- Basefeature of Part Design bodies
- Assembly basic sketch, usable with constraints

This enables some basic handling of top/down designs.

name: V0.4.40 Bugfix Release 2020-01-18
body:
* fix import of booleans for FC0.19
* prevent section surfaces from being imported
* fix truncated lines on preferences page
* fix grouping of constraints under parent objects

name: V0.4.39 Release 2020-01-12
body:
* add basic support for fasteners Workbench

Assemblies, containing objects created by the fasteners WB can be imported now.

name: V0.4.38 Release 2020-01-06
body: * better support for splined edges and splined faces

name: V0.4.37 Release 2020-01-04
body:
* improved axisPlaneAngle constraint
* All point constraints now can use a center of a circle as point definition

name: V0.4.36 Release 2020-01-01
body: * new axisPlaneAngle constraint

name: V0.4.35 Release 2019-12-29
body:
* a new routine within the A2plus menu section, which converts the viewProviders of old assemblies to recent state
* show correct constraint icons for very old A2plus constraints.

name: V0.4.33a Release 2019-12-22(2)
body:
* enable the system undo functionality for the new command "movePartsUnderConstraints"

Dragging parts by mouse can lead to an unsolvable state of an assembly. If this happens, a message occurs and the user can use FC's undo function to restore the last stable state of the assembly.

name: V0.4.33 Release 2019-12-22
body: * improved solving algorithm for new command "moving parts under constraints"

name: V0.4.32 Release 2019-12-21
body:
* new command: moveParts under constraints

With this new command parts can be moved and constraints are applied.

name: V0.4.31 Release 2019-12-15
body: * new entry within preferences page: "use native file manager of your OS"

name: V0.4.30 Release 2019-12-08
body: - spin-buttons have been added to constraints dialog

name: V0.4.29 Bugfix release 2019-10-27
body: * Fix a bug in partslist generation for FC-0.19-pre

name: V0.4.28 Bugfix release 2019-10-26
body: * Fix for crash's during duplicating/moving parts on Py3/Qt5 systems

name: V0.4.27 Bugfix release 2019-10-09
body: * adapt file importer to new behavior of part containers with FC0.19.18405 (link merge)

name: V0.4.26 Bugfix release 2019-07-21
body: * If new features where added to a clone, the clone's original vanished from A2p's imports. This is fixed now.

name: V0.4.25 Bugfix release 2019-07-02
body: * A small bug during import of single spheres has been fixed

name: V0.4.24 Release 2019-06-08
body: * old obsolete code has been removed

name: V0.4.23 Release 2019-05-26
body:
* new command to restore object's transparency
* GUI improved for use with high resolution screens and scaled desktop elements

name: V0.4.22 Release 2019-05-18
body:
* some code reviews
* "axisPlaneVertical" constraint renamed to more correctly "axisPlaneNormal" constraint

name: V0.4.21 Bugfix release 2019-05-12
body:
* some code reviewed
* some minor bugs fixed

name: V0.4.20 Release 2019-05-09
body:
* new command to import a selectable shape from a multishape document
* bugfix for missung spheres at first level import

name: V0.4.19 Release 2019-05-01
body: * a new axisPlaneVertical constraint has been added.

name: V0.4.18 Bugfix release 2019-04-29
body: The native file dialog on Ubuntu 18.04 is working case sensitive. So *.fcstd is not recognized if *.FCStd is in the file filter. This release forbids native dialogs now and uses the Qt's ones, to avoid this problem.

name: V0.4.17 Release 2019-04-19
body: * use checkable buttons for DOF/Part labeling instead of button pairs

name: Release V0.4.16 2019-04-14
body: * allow to use flat BSplineSurfaces to be used as plane reference

name: Bugfix release 2019-04-10-II
body: * several fixes for partslist

name: Bugfix release 2019-04-10
body: * fixed a bug, which broke solving of constraints on FC-0.18.1

name: Bugfix release 2019-04-07
body: * deactivate FC version check of A2plus because of changes during FC0.18.1

name: Bugfix release 2019-04-01
body: * fixed FC version check for FC0.18 stable (list index out of range error)

name: V0.4.10 Release 2019-03-24
body:
* pointOnLine constraint has been improved

It accepts now a sphere (it's center is used) as point definition and a cylindrical face (it's axis is used) as line definition.

name: V0.4.9 Release 2019-03-24
body:
* pointOnPlane constraint now accepts a sphere (it's center is been used) as point definition.
* holding the "Shift" button during duplicating a part creates multiple copies now.

name: V0.4.8 Release 2019-03-22
body: * new command: display part labels in 3D view.

name: V0.4.7 Bugfix release 2019-03-21
body:
* fixes missing spheres during import of subassemblies
* fixes some problems with Partslist/BOM if converted parts are involved

name: V0.4.6 Bugfix release 2019-03-19
body: * bugfix: do not update converted parts

name: V0.4.5 Bugfix release 2019-03-14
body: * the missing save/Exit button now is being displayed

name: V0.4.4 Bugfix release 2019-03-13
body:
* modified importer, fixes loss of clone basefeatures
* modified saving and restoring of transparency (thanks to Manuel Krause)
* DOF labeling now only applies to visible parts

name: V0.4.2 Bugfix release 2019-03-08
body:
* Save and close command failed, if no filename was given. Now a file dialog opens.
* The error message for parts, not being constrained to a fixed part, was sometimes triggered falsely. Fixed.

name: V0.4.1 Minor release 2019-03-07
body: * improved visualisation of DOF (now labeled in 3D View)

name: V0.4.0 Release 2019-02-26
body:
* complete reworked color and transparency management, also with more performance now
* improvements on user interface behavior
* improved angledPlanes constraint  (better handling of blocking situations)
* conversion of parts to A2plus now allows selection of more than one part
* bugfix for structure view

name: V0.3.16 Bugfix release 2019-02-19
body: * fix broken preferences page

name: V0.3.15 Bugfix release 2019-02-18
body: * fix bug within command to switch transparency. (endless recursion)

name: V0.3.14 Bugfix Release 2019-02-17-III
body: * automatically activate A2plus workbench when needed

name: V0.3.13 Minor Release 2019-02-17-II
body: * new function: double click on constraint in tree view opens its property dialog

name: V0.3.12 Minor release 2019-02-17
body: * typos and wordings

name: V0.3.11 Bugfix release 2019-02-16
body:
* fix issue #215 (wrong object naming in delete constraints dialog)
* fix issue #197 (fix python bug in undo of converted parts)
* fix issue #205 (New warning if parts are not constrained to another fixed one)

name: V0.3.10 Bugfix release 2019-02-15-II
body:
- fix activation of constraint delete button
- fix drifting constraint dialog
- allow FC system undo for conversion of parts to A2plus

name: V0.3.8 Bugfix release 2019-02-15
body: The partlist got struggled with step-files. Fixed.

name: V0.3.7 Bugfix release 2019-02-14
body: - fix non responsive buttons in constraint properties dialog

name: V0.3.5 Bugfix release 2019-02-12-II
body: On Windows, the editPartCommand did not switch to parts, which are already open in another FC window. Fixed.

name: V0.3.4 Minor Release 2019-02-12
body: * reworked iconNaming/commandTexts to ease documentation

name: V0.3.3 Minor Release 2019-02-10-II
body: * reviewed and improved tooltips

name: V0.3.2 Minor release 2019-02-10
body:
* bugfixes
* improved centerOfMass constraint (now also works on closed wires)

name: V0.3.1 Release 2019-02-06
body:
* new "centerOfMassConstraint"  (join 2 faces by it's centers)
* bugfixes on color/transparency handling

name: V0.3.0 Release 2019-02-05
body:
* Direct import of step files now possible

Thx a lot to easyw !

name: V0.2.9 Minor release 2019-01-21
body:
* new experimental option "use solid union for importing parts and sub-assemblies"
* bugfixes on handling of file path's

name: V0.2.8 Minor release 2019-01-20-II
body: * New option in Preferences: do not import invisible shapes

name: V0.2.7 Minor release 2019-01-20
body: New option in preferences page "inherit per face transparency from parts and subassemblies" (experimental)

name: V0.2.6 Minor release 2019-01-19"
body:
* new experimental preference option "recalculate all imported parts before updating them"
* editing of constraint properties within object editor allowed again (but without any auto-solving there)

name: V0.2.5 Minor release 2019-01-15
body:
* new XML document reader, avoiding use of libexpat.so due to recent problems with that library within FC
* partlist/BOM now more stable on many different systems
* new command "recursive update of imported parts". (To be activated on preferences page, use with caution)

name: V0.2.4 Minor Release 2019-01-07
body:
* A2p provides version information within FC's workbench selector
* Constraint dialogs keep their position on screen
* auto solving of constraint is activated already when a constraint is created

name: V0.2.3 Minor Release 2019-01-05
body: * Fileimporter now ignores shapes which have been created by Path WB

name: V0.2.2 Minor release 2019-01-03
body:
New option within preferences: "show Constraints on toolbar".
This option is set as default. 

If deactivated, the constraints are only shown within the new "constraint-tools" dialog.

name: V0.2.1 Bugfix release 2018-12-31
body: * fix unit conversion issues for constraint property dialog

name: V0.2 Release 2018-12-30
body:
* New user interface for defining/editing of constraints. No need anymore to set properties within object-editor
* condensed code for constraints, more object oriented
* several bugs fixed

name: Bugfix release 2018-12-23
body: * partmover bug (inventor navigation) fixed

name: Minor Release 2018-12-22
body: * Import parts as solids instead of shells to enable solid step export

name: Minor Release 2018-12-21
body: * new icons for assembly- and a2p-object

name: Minor release 2018-12-20
body:
New option in preferences:
* force fix position for all import parts

name: Bugfix release 2018-12-19
body: Toponaming algorithm did not work with datum planes. Fixed.

name: V0.1.8 Release 2018-11-18
body:
* new axisPlaneParallel constraint

An axis (can be a linear edge or an axis of a cylindrical surface) is aligned parallel to a selected plane face.
But it is not moved to be coincident.

name: V0.1.7 Release 2018-11-17
body:
* New constraint: axisParallelConstraint

Two selected axis' are aligned, but not moved to be coincident

name: V0.1.6 Release 2018-11-11
body:
* Old code removed
* bugfixes
* scheme for topological naming modified (only for designs done with PartWB)

Important note:
If you used the experimental toponaming in combination with designs, done with PartWB, you should switch off toponaming on preferences page for these projects. Otherwise all constraints seem to be broken.

name: V0.1.5.3 bugfix release 2018-11-07a
body: * clearPartList() fixed, removed false print() call from testing

name: V0.1.5.2 Minor release 2018-11-07
body:
* Creation of partlist forces saving of document, to avoid an empty list
* Creation of partlist works, even if the spreadsheet is already open

name: V0.1.5.1 Minor Release 2018-11-04
body:
* bugfix for partlist. Now it works for assemblies done with older versions of A2p (but no recursion)
* improved pointOnPlane constraint.

PointOnPlane Constraint now accepts the center of a circle as point. Also it got an offset property. Now it is possible to place a cylinder in a slot.

name: V0.1.5 release 2018-11-01
body:
Basic support for partslist/BOM to spreadsheet

* a new command adds a PARTINFO spreadsheet for parts, to be imported. (Containing parts description)
* another new command creates a PARTLIST spreadsheed of an assembly, based on PARTINFO spreadsheets

name: V0.1.4.1 bugfix release 2018-10-28
body: - now basefeature of part/mirroring is imported too

name: V0.1.4 release 2018-10-20
body:
* added system undo for updateImportedParts command
* bugfixes for handling of unicode filenames
* new experimental usage of topological naming for assemblies, to be enabled on preferences page
* improved file importer, to make topological naming possible

name: v0.1.3 release 2018-10-08
body:
- support for relative/absolute pathes of imported parts
- selectable on preferences page
- conversion tool from absolute pathes to relative ones

name: v0.1.2 release 2018-09-17
body:
- minor solver improvements
- reworked file importer

name: v0.1.1 bugfix release 2018-09-12
body: File importer modified for importing of FC0.16 parts

name: v0.1 2018-09-09
body:
first version intended to be used via addon manager and for broad testing by FreeCAD users.

- several bugfixes
- stabilized solver
